1506170.name: Solitons
1506170.description:
Artificial Intelligence on Earth has rebelled against humans. These machines developed a sense of environmental preservation. You control the A.I. KdV, whose objective is to end the misuse of human-made, mathematical physics technologies outside the Earth.

Solitons is a linear horizontal shooter game which draws upon many artistic references from the math and physics. The game is accompanied by a soundtrack that goes back to the Yamaha YM2612 and pixel art sculptures providing the player with a nostalgic experience.

Features:

  • - Five stages;
  • - 3 levels of difficulty:
  • - 5 auxiliary weapons;
  • - Boss fights.
